content.query:
Create table dwh.DimPolicies
	(
	PolicyKey int identity(1,1) ,
	[CountryKey] int NULL ,
	[DateKey] int   NULL,
	[C1_School closing] bigint  NULL,
	[C1_Flag] bit  NULL,
	[C2_Workplace closing] bigint NULL,
	[C2_Flag] bit NULL,
	[C3_Cancel public events]bigint  NULL,
	[C3_Flag] bit  NULL,
	[C4_Restrictions on gatherings] bigint  NULL,
	[C4_Flag] bit  NULL,
	[C5_Close public transport] bigint  NULL,
	[C5_Flag] bit  NULL,
	[C6_Stay at home requirements] bigint  NULL,
	[C6_Flag] bit  NULL,
	[C7_Restrictions on internal movement] bigint  NULL,
	[C7_Flag] bit  NULL,
	[C8_International travel controls] bigint  NULL,
	[E1_Income support] bigint  NULL,
	[E1_Flag] bit  NULL,
	[E2_Debt contract relief] bigint  NULL,
	[E3_Fiscal measures] float  NULL,
	[E4_International support] float NULL,
	[H1_Public information campaigns] bigint  NULL,
	[H1_Flag] bit  NULL,
	[H2_Testing policy] bigint  NULL,
	[H3_Contact tracing] bigint  NULL,
	[H4_Emergency investment in healthcare] float  NULL,
	[H5_Investment in vaccines] float  NULL,
	[H6_Facial Coverings] bigint  NULL,
	[H6_Flag] bit  NULL,
	[H7_Vaccination policy] bigint  NULL,
	[H7_Flag] bit  NULL,
	[H8_Protection of elderly people] bigint NULL,
	[H8_Flag] bit NULL,
	[M1_Wildcard] bigint  NULL,
	[StringencyIndex] float  NULL,
	[StringencyIndexForDisplay] float  NULL,
	[StringencyLegacyIndex] float  NULL,
	[CStringencyLegacyIndexForDisplay] float  NULL,
	[GovernmentResponseIndex] float  NULL,
	[GovernmentResponseIndexForDisplay] float  NULL,
	[ContainmentHealthIndex] float  NULL,
	[ContainmentHealthIndexForDisplay] float  NULL,
	[EconomicSupportIndex] float  NULL,
	[EconomicSupportIndexForDisplay] float NULL,
    Created_date datetime2 ,
    Updated_date datetime2
	)
